attributes.action: Put an end to the BBC TV License Fee
attributes.additional_details:
In recent years and particular during the era of the Covid-19 pandemic, household bills have become increasingly more difficult for many people. 
I am reasonably asking for the BBC TV License Fee to be ended as soon as humanly possible.

The TV License Fee is an outdated relic of a bygone era and one which is becoming a further needless expense, for many a downtrodden household.

A socially responsible Government would choose to end a scheme which heaps misery on the poorer parts of our society.
attributes.background: I wish for the Government to help put an end to the BBC TV License Fee.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555918
